article.headline: Utah State 83, Idaho 58
article.story: LOGAN, Utah (AP) -- Jaycee Carroll scored 19 points as Utah State ran by Idaho 83-58 Saturday night. Carroll was one of three Aggies to score in double digits. Cass Matheus also scored 14 and pulled down a team-high nine rebounds for USU (11-4, 3-2 Western Athletic Conference). Nate Harris also scored 13. The Vandals (3-11, 0-4 WAC) were led in scoring by Tanoris Shepard with 22 points and Keoni Watson with 14. Matheus scored the fist 10 points of the second half for USU, as the Aggies began the half with a 17-5 run and extended the lead to 47-29. After the first four minutes of the half, Idaho never got closer than 18 points and trailed by as many as 30. After managing only five points in the first half on 2-of-6 shooting, Carroll made 5-of-6 in the second half, four of them 3-point shots. In the first half, neither team shot the ball well. USU shot 3-of-11 from behind the 3-point line and 42 percent from the field. Idaho only managed 10-of-27 shooting in the half and turned the ball over nine times as USU took a 30-24 halftime lead. USU came into the game with the fourth best field goal percentage in the country (51.7 percent). Before Saturday, night's game, Carroll was 11th in the nation in 3-point shooting at 47.6 percent.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
